Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Paint coating disbondment. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Contamination ingress through damaged seal assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Access Panels component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: M - Other Reasons
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 30/09/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
